title: Humanoid
data:
The **humanoid** attribute means that a monster has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso, and is generally humanlike in appearance. All monsters in the [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid_\(monster_class\) "Humanoid (monster class)") monster class and all @ are humanoid. Most humanoid monsters are capable of wearing [armor](/wiki/Armor "Armor") and wielding [weapons](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") as long as they are of an appropriate size to do so.

The humanoid monster class

- h [hobbit](/wiki/Hobbit "Hobbit")
- h [dwarf](/wiki/Dwarf_\(monster\) "Dwarf (monster)")
- h [bugbear](/wiki/Bugbear "Bugbear")
- h [dwarf lord](/wiki/Dwarf_lord "Dwarf lord")
- h [dwarf king](/wiki/Dwarf_king "Dwarf king")
- h [mind flayer](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer")
- h [master mind flayer](/wiki/Master_mind_flayer "Master mind flayer")

The [giant humanoid](/wiki/Giant_humanoid "Giant humanoid") monster class

- H [giant](/wiki/Giant "Giant")
- H [stone giant](/wiki/Stone_giant "Stone giant")
- H [hill giant](/wiki/Hill_giant "Hill giant")
- H [fire giant](/wiki/Fire_giant "Fire giant")
- H [frost giant](/wiki/Frost_giant "Frost giant")
- H [storm giant](/wiki/Storm_giant "Storm giant")
- H [ettin](/wiki/Ettin "Ettin")
- H [titan](/wiki/Titan "Titan")
- H [minotaur](/wiki/Minotaur "Minotaur")
- H [Cyclops](/wiki/Cyclops "Cyclops")

Many other monsters are also humanoid

- g, [gremlin](/wiki/Gremlin "Gremlin")

html:
Humanoid

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The humanoid attribute means that a monster has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso, and is generally humanlike in appearance. All monsters in the humanoid monster class and all @ are humanoid. Most humanoid monsters are capable of wearing armor and wielding weapons as long as they are of an appropriate size to do so.

The humanoid monster class

  • h hobbit
  • h dwarf
  • h bugbear
  • h dwarf lord
  • h dwarf king
  • h mind flayer
  • h master mind flayer

The giant humanoid monster class

  • H giant
  • H stone giant
  • H hill giant
  • H fire giant
  • H frost giant
  • H storm giant
  • H ettin
  • H titan
  • H minotaur
  • H Cyclops

Many other monsters are also humanoid

rawPage:
The '''humanoid''' attribute means that a monster has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso, and is generally humanlike in appearance. All monsters in the [[humanoid (monster class)|humanoid]] monster class and all {{white|@}} are humanoid. Most humanoid monsters are capable of wearing [[armor]] and wielding [[weapon]]s as long as they are of an appropriate size to do so.

The humanoid monster class 
* {{monsymlink|hobbit}}
* {{monsymlink|dwarf}}
* {{monsymlink|bugbear}}
* {{monsymlink|dwarf lord}}
* {{monsymlink|dwarf king}}
* {{monsymlink|mind flayer}}
* {{monsymlink|master mind flayer}}
